name: Sherry Matthews Group
description:
There are some terrific ad agencies that sell cheeseburgers, spark plugs, and chewing gum. That’s not who we are. Whether it’s for the environment, health, education, transportation, humanitarian aid, or wildlife preservation, we are advocates for positive change. This isn’t a division of our company. This is our company. Everyone who works here is united in the desire to be part of the solution. We’ve been successful because we know how to navigate tough social issues.
And we work hard on behalf of our clients. Changing behavior will always be a challenge. And we’re up for it. Let us go to work for you.
